message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,150,000. It's a valuable asset that I believe will be of great benefit to you. Let's discuss this further.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $1,000,000 is a good starting point, I'm confident the product's value to you warrants a higher price. I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000, but I can't go lower than that. Let's find a middle ground and make this deal work.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $1,050,000. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $1,025,000, but that's my final offer. I'm not sure I can go any higher.
